description: Decompress JPEG XL images. Accepted output extensions are PNG, APNG, JPEG, EXR, PGM, PPM, PNM, PFM, PAM, EXIF, XMP and JUMBF. More information: https://github.com/libjxl/libjxl.

useCases.description: Decompress a JPEG XL image to another format:
